title: Minecraft官网的启动器的问题
txt_content:
我登陆后点下载就会出现这段文字：{When you have bought the game, you can download the stand-alone launcher for Minecraft here. It will automatically update the game files with the latest version. You'll be able to play the game without an Internet connection if you've been online at least once}
我已经买了，但是下载不了，谁能教我一下？
